subject: refactor: remove all Koinz branding references
body:
Replace Koinz Style Guide references with generic theme terminology
throughout the codebase. The design system remains identical, just
without the external branding.

Files updated:
- tailwind.config.js, global.css, styles/theme.js: Updated comments
- constants/tones.ts: Simplified color reference comment
- CLAUDE.md: Renamed section to "Theme & Colors"
- docs/HISTORY.md: Updated historical references
title: remove all Koinz branding references
